title: Year 3 of no Rek'Sai skin

embed.description: Kind of bummed out that Rek'Sai hasn't had a new skin in two years this coming June 26th. She's my favorite champ too </3 I get that there are other champs that haven't got one in a while. But Rek'Sai is a relatively modern champ.

body: June 26th will mark the 3 year anniversary of Pool Party Rek'Sai's release. I made a post around this time last year and will do so every year from now on until Rek'Sai finally gets a skin =( Alot of people pointed out that there were a handful of champs that have gone longer without a skin than Rek'Sai in my post from last year. However, 95 percent of the champs that people listed have gotten a skin since that post. I get anxious whenever PBE gets updated hoping that my wait will finally come to an end, but I'm only met with disappointment when I see that champs like Lux or Miss Fortune get their 2nd skin in the span of a year. If any Rioter reads this, please at least let me know if there is a skin in development for Rek'Sai. That'll be enough to keep me happy for a long time. Even if it doesn't come out for a bit. I really hope its a Gemstone skin since Riot seems to give not very popular champs those kinds of skins. Hextech Rek'Sai sounds amazing =(

replies.body: There will be hope, shen just got  his first skin since 2012, progress is being made

I'm super on board with a new Rek'Sai skin, but I don't want it to be a gemstone skin.  After waiting so long for her it'd be a shame to have her first skin in forever (and only her third skin) be near un-obtainable.

Rek'Sai definitely needs a skin for sure. May i also add....
{{champion:39}}  <--------- 3 years no skin. So I feel your pain buddy.
Star Guardian Irelia or DawnBringer Irelia will suffice riot. 
TY.
